original_text: People will refuse to listen to God's true message. Instead, they will want to listen to silly stories that are false.
korean_text: 또 그 귀를 진리에서 돌이켜 허탄한 이야기를 따르리라

sentences.original_text: People will refuse to listen to God's true message.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 하나님의 진정한 메시지를 듣기를 거절할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Instead, they will want to listen
to silly stories that are false.
